Icon Accordion

You may wish to highlight accordions with icons. If you choose this option, do so consistently throughout a course or for a clear and specific one-time purpose. Please also only use this accordion style if you plan to use icons on every accordion in the set.

Learn how to change icons and icon color in this video tutorial! 

Learn how to add accordions to a set in this video tutorial.
